page.title: 03Tourism in Lansallos
page.content: There are 3 caravan/camping sites in Lansallos,though they are relatively small,about 15 units.Farms are allowed a limited number of caravans, dependant on acreage.Many redundant buildings have been converted for letting for holiday accommodation. Even good properties are being purchased by wealthier people and let to produce income.The narrow Cornish lanes were not designed for large numbers of cars and jams are frequent. Generally the surface of the highways is well maintained,but to widen the lanes would be prohibitively expensive and not desireable.There is NO public transportat all.
